description: Cleo Skill Registry — community skills for dynamic installation

skills.name: Browser Control
skills.description: Playwright-based browser automation — navigate, click, type, screenshot, extract data from web pages. Use for web scraping, form filling, and automated testing.
skills.author: cleo-core

skills.name: PDF Tools
skills.description: Advanced PDF manipulation — merge, split, rotate, extract text, convert pages to images. Requires qpdf and poppler.
skills.author: cleo-core

skills.name: ImageMagick Tools
skills.description: Image manipulation — resize, crop, convert formats, add watermarks, create thumbnails. Uses ImageMagick CLI.
skills.author: cleo-core

skills.name: YouTube Downloader
skills.description: Download videos and audio from YouTube and 1000+ other sites. Extract metadata, thumbnails, subtitles.
skills.author: cleo-community

skills.name: FFmpeg Media Tools
skills.description: Audio/video processing — convert formats, extract audio, trim clips, merge files, create GIFs from video.
skills.author: cleo-core

skills.name: SQLite Query
skills.description: Query and manage SQLite databases — run SQL, export CSV/JSON, schema inspection, data analysis.
skills.author: cleo-core

skills.name: Docker Compose
skills.description: Manage Docker containers and compose stacks — build, run, monitor, debug containerized services.
skills.author: cleo-community

skills.name: JQ JSON Processor
skills.description: Process and transform JSON data using jq — filter, map, reduce, format JSON from APIs and files.
skills.author: cleo-community

skills.name: Rsync Backup
skills.description: File synchronization and backup using rsync — incremental backups, remote sync, excludes, dry-run preview.
skills.author: cleo-community

skills.name: Ollama Local LLM
skills.description: Run local LLMs via Ollama — query models, compare outputs, use as secondary opinion or fallback.
skills.author: cleo-community
